verbs.description: si group [ARGM-MNR: family] - [V: owned] niskayuna - based chemical maker sold niskayuna si group the niskayuna - based chemical manufacturer with 20 factories worldwide has been acquired by the private equity firm sk capital partners terms of the deal were not disclosed but si group has 1 billion in annual sales and 2 800 employees worldwide the company was founded by w howard wright in 1906 schenectady varnish company sk capital
